text.title: Make Your Birthday Wish Come True

p.s: Do n't you hate when you want to make a wish come true but do n't know how to ?
Here are some really easy steps to get your wish granted , or TRY too .
If you want that , then keep reading .

list.item:
Your counting down to your birthday ! And your hoping the wish comes true .
But so many wishes !
What wish will you choose ?
Start your Wish Journal .
Draw pictures , write down your wishes , do anything you want explaining your wishes .

Some people say to get a charm bracelet , choker , or anything you can wear .
Find a gold or silver chain and get a charm based on it .
Want a phone ?
Get a phone charm .
If you want an animal , get the animal charm of it .
Any charm based on what you want will work .
Where it till your wish starts coming true

"
What day is it ?
How many more days left ?
" You probably ask yourself every morning .
To keep organized , make a calender to help count down the days .
Every day , cross off a number .
Keep organized in the calender and journal .
This is especially important for the big day .

Every night , do n't stay up and watch TV ! Goto sleep , and put on some classical music and light some candles { If you 're a child , ask your parents to this or buy some lavender } .
Remember to wish every night .
Do not change the wish .
Every night you wish , the more powerful the chance of the wish coming true is .

Finally !
Your birthday 's today !
And your ready for this wish .
Did you do all the steps ?
Do n't tell ANYONE your wish . or it will not come true .
But before you do , have complete faith in this .

item.s:
The Birthday Song 's playing , everyone 's grinning at you , ready for you to blow the candles out .
close your eyes , puff up your cheeks with air , and POOF !
As you blow out the candles , silently think your wish .

list.item:
There 's an old tale about writing down your wish after you blow out the candles and getting a flower seed and putting it in a flower pot .
Put your paper inside the pot too .
As the flower sprouts , your wish is coming more and more true .

item.s: That way you 've more chance to blow them all out at once .
Think about the wish as you blow the candles .
Close your eyes and make sure you have a big , poof of air in your mouth to blow out those candles .
Meditating will have a lot , thinking about your wish .

list.item: DO NOT make the wish harmful , or most likely the nature spirits will never grant your wishes ever , ever again .

item.s: Do not open your eyes during the process of blowing the candles .
If after you blow out the candles you light them again , the second time wish will NOT be granted .
